title: cant log in
body: for some reason I and my friends cant log in the server, it says that wasnt able to connect to the server, we are all from portugal and our internet is working very well

replies.body: Are you receiving any errors while logging in?  It sounds like something might be blocking our server from authenticating your login.  The guide Rineyy provided should help troubleshoot this!

We definitely don’t want you to miss the party, so here’s the security pass to the [Login Platform.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4hsbxlb85qU/VRqK0_slEZI/AAAAAAAAnDE/bBjnYxLhpOs/s1600/AmumuLoadScreen_8.png
